Literature.Title: The design of cell-selective tryptophan and arginine-rich antimicrobial peptides by introducing hydrophilic uncharged residues.
Literature.Author: Zhu Y, Akhtar MU, Li B, Chou S, Shao C, Li J, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=64 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:10% Cell death=32 µM,Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:10% Cell death=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli K99(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CVCC 503(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 7469(MIC=16µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0385(MIC=16µM),Streptococcus thermophilus YM-C(MIC=>64µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(10-20% Killing=32µM)
